data.subjects: a young woman in a red coat, people walking in the background
data.pose_action: The woman walks down the street, occasionally stopping to look in shop windows. She adjusts her umbrella as the rain picks up
data.camera: shot with a 35mm lens on Canon C300
data.framing_action: The camera follows the woman from a medium distance, occasionally cutting to close-ups of her face and hands
data.grading: cinematic, moody, with enhanced contrast and desaturated colors

metadata.description: Example street scene with atmospheric weather
